content: **need more yarn check out my new online yarn shop for more supplies three birds yarn studio 1 ** 3 sizes included in the pattern baby child adult **gauge** with us 15 10 0mm needles 8 sts and 13 row make a 4 square in stockinette stitch **materials needed** 10 12 16 yards/16 20 26 grams of super bulky weight yarn in white or cream 38 51 72 yards/61 82 115 grams of super bulky weight yarn in red or burgundy us 13 9 0mm 16 circular needles us 15 10 0mm 16 circular needles us 15 10 0mm double pointed needles pom pom maker extra white or cream yarn for the pom pom stitch marker tapestry needle **skills/stitches required** cast on knitting in the round on circular needles and dpns knit/purl k2tog making a pom pom merry christmas from the gates family 1 https //threebirdsyarnstudio com/
